review.description: Good selection of organic, vegan and vegertarian items. The staff are helpful and offer suggestions. The prices are good. I would check the expiration date somethings are destined to be expired , it happens.
review.author: Tracy P.

review.description:
I love this place!!! I get lunch here more times than not & I've never had something I didn't like - seriously!

They have everything you need with prices that put the flashier markets in Brooklyn Heights to shame. I only wish they had fresh produce too but there's a farmer's market 1 block away so it's not really a problem.
review.author: Kate V.

review.description: Usually healthy and delicious don't go together, but here, they do.  The food is natural and yummy, especially the smoothies. I'm always looking for a cheap eat, so the hot buffet bar has good food, meat, salads- for just $8.
review.author: Thea T.
